tweet: Solar panels electricity is the cleanest, cheapest and most efficient form of electricity available.
If everyone in the world used solar panels to produced electricity for their homes and businesses, we'd have no power lines.
Solar panels make no pollution.  Unless damaged by weather or an accident, they always work.
Solar panels have been around a long time.  Their use should be more widespread.  It's just a matter of changing our habits.
